Description:
Original beach volley map made by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/DerzoDev/myworkshopfiles/]Derzo[/url].
I added an invisible wall in the middle. This allows for faster recovery, more ball airtime and more plays!


[h1]How to play with friends[/h1]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vfIIa2cUZSE

[h1]Recommended Mutators[/h1]
Ball type:		Beach ball
Boost amount:	Unlimited
Respawn time:Disable goal reset
Gravity:		Low
[b]I recommend a gravity between -400 and -450 in bakkesmod instead of the low gravity mutator for optimal gameplay[/b]

If anyone is interested in playing workshop maps with the community, including this map, feel free to join this discord that was created exactly for that! It's full of players hosting games and wanting to try new maps
https://discord.gg/kVGR4vB

Enjoy!
